Inverse Sbox test bench
("00000000", "01010010")
, -- :0x52
("00000001", "00001001")
, -- :0x09
("00010000", "01111100")
, -- :0x7C
("00100000", "01010100")
, -- :0x54
("11110000", "00010111")
, -- :0x17
("11111111", "01111101")
, -- :0x7D
("01100011", "00000000")
, -- 0x63:
("01111100", "00000001")
, -- 0x7C:
("11001010", "00010000")
, -- 0xCA:
("10110111", "00100000")
, -- 0xB7:
("10001100", "11110000")
, -- 0x8C:
("00010110", "11111111")  -- 0x16:
